synopsis.text:
Due to the annual Daihasei Festival, a seven-day athletic competition between esper schools, the bustling Academy City opens its doors to the public. The prestigious all-girls Tokiwadai Middle School, home to the highest-ranked Electromaster, Mikoto Misaka, is taking part in the event. Despite Mikoto's formidable powers, her fellow students remain determined to give their all in the competition.

As the festival preparations reach their peak, the city is alive with excitement, and no one suspects the sinister activities unfolding behind the scenes. Unbeknownst to the students, various factions are plotting to infiltrate Academy City during this time of vulnerability. With Mikoto in their crosshairs, shadowy figures begin to emerge, threatening to disrupt the festivities and reveal the darker side of this seemingly utopian city.

Join Mikoto Misaka, her friends, and her underclassmen Shirai Kuroko, a member of the disciplinary organization Judgment, as they navigate the dangers lurking beneath the surface of the Daihasei Festival in Toaru Kagaku no Railgun T. From terrorist attacks to ruthless underground projects, the girls must confront the hidden threats that lie within Academy City.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
